Title.evidence: The Carotid Revascularization and Medical Management for Asymptomatic Carotid Stenosis Trial (CREST-2) is a pair of randomized trials

Trial_Design.evidence: a pair of randomized trials assessing the relative efficacy of carotid revascularization

Participants.evidence: patients with asymptomatic high-grade atherosclerotic stenosis

Intervention.evidence: One of the trials assesses IMM with or without carotid artery stenting (CAS).

Objective.evidence: This analysis describes the protocol-driven approach to credentialing of CAS interventionists for CREST-2 and its outcomes.

Result_Outcome.evidence: approval increased to 46% (153/334) after submission of new cases with added training and rereview.
